Notes to Table 8.2.1.3.-A:
(1) The *occupant load* shall be calculated using Subsection 3.1.17. (2) Where multiple calculations of *sanitary sewage* volume is permitted, the calculation resulting in the highest flow shall be used in determining the design daily *sanitary sewage* flow. (3) Total finished area, excluding the area of the finished *basement*.
